I Am Shutting Down The Blog

June 5, 2020 · by Support CMShelplive · in Uncategorized · Leave a comment

I have decided to no longer maintain a blog. I will be doing an email list for those of you who are interested. Should you want to stay in email contact, you can reach me at rc2do_good@yahoo,com. RCP.
